review: Bought this thinking it would simply plug in to HDMI and not require any power cords, etc (unlike AppleTV). Wrong. The marketing is misleading. You also have to plug this in to a wall outlet/USB for power, so you still have to deal with routing and hiding wires. Not sure if Chromecast is the same or not.  Still a good price for adding smart TV features, but I prefer AppleTV if I have to hide wires anyway.
author: Pat

review: EVERYONE needs one of these. I can't believe how amazing they are. With them being so cheap I didn't have very high expectations, but I was blown away. I want to buy one for every TV in my house now.
